column4: when i start a vnc server what does this mean? xauth:  error in locking authority file /home/tokapie/.Xauthority
no - I'm trying to vnc over hamachi
it's a real pain in the ars
I have important things to do, like Team Fortress ;)
do you have a local GUI login?
X uses a crypto token system to allow access to the server sessions
If you're familiar with the old xhost command, it's a more secure version of that
for some reason, Xvnc isn't able to grab a lock on that file.. not sure why tho
Dunno if I can help you right now.
